comment: This is an example configuration for SynegoBase Nginx setup.

https.comment: Enable HTTPS by providing SSL certificate and key paths.

comment_worker_connections: Sets the max simultaneous connections per worker. If you see a 'exceed open file resource limit' warning on startup, your OS has a lower limit. You can either lower this value to match your OS limit (e.g., 256) or increase your OS's file limit (ulimit).

logs.comment: Paths are relative to your project root where you run the script.

static_serving.comment: Each object in this array defines a static serving location.
You can have multiple static directories.
This makes the uploaded files accessible via a URL.

spa_serving.comment: This block serves a Vue/React/Angular SPA using history mode.

reverse_proxy.comment: Proxy requests to your backend application.

upload.comment: This block handles file uploads, saving them to a temp directory and passing the path to a backend handler.
